name: Death Is Only The Beginning (The Game She Plays)
name_original: Death Is Only The Beginning (The Game She Plays)
description:
Ah, the sweet embrace of death... or so you thought. Far from relaxing for eternity, you found yourself in some sort of office building.

With a job.

Death Is Only The Beginning is a 2.5D platformer set post-life.

Played on keyboard, available in-browser and PC download.

Made for the GameDev.tv Jam 2022.

Source code is provided for educational purposes only.
